title: Animal Crossing: What It Needs to Fix - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.25.20
description:
Greg rants about what Animal Crossing needs to fix, Blessing talks Beat Saber, and we discuss Nintendo's COVID moves. 

Time Stamps - 
00:04:18 - Housekeeping
Remember the Gamescast has been KILLING it with reviews. You can catch our takes on Half-Life: Alyx, Doom Eternal, and Animal Crossing on youtube.com/kindafunnygames or the Gamescast podcast feed.
Gregway is live on patreon.com/kindafunny -- it’s a private Q&A in Animal Crossing! Get it for a buck.
Mohammed Mohammed, Sancho West Gaming, Max Blair, Michael Bradley, James Hastings, Duval King Jabub, Julian The Gluten Free Gamer, Joseph O Youssef, Evan Ballard, Cody Banks, Tom Bock, Steven Insler, Trent Berri, NanoSupport
The Roper Report   -
00:05:55 - Animal Crossing CRUSHES in Japan
00:37:05 - Doom Eternal Breaks Franchise Sales Record
00:40:00 - Nintendo and COVID
00:48:30 - With NASCAR, F1, and NBA moving to esports to continue to give fans some sense of the sports season continuing, do you think this will help get rid of the stigma of esports not being sports? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:53:10 - Just Cause’s Avalanche Rebrands, Matt Purslow @ IG
00:56:10 -  QUIP
00:57:25 -  ExpressVPN
00:58:55 - Out today
01:03:20 - Squad Up: Fernando Rodrigues(Switch) - Olivs: SW-2183- 7900-5427
01:04:20 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Ben Hanson from MinnMax
